EmailTemplate.name: 2019_APAC_EmailOptIn_mih.2019_APAC_EmailOptIn_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Let’s Keep in Touch
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> ALWAYS BE THE FIRST TO KNOW Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Thank you for your interest in Honeywell in-flight connectivity solutions. To keep receiving our updates about Connectivity & Services offerings, news, events and special offers, we need you to confirm that you agree to continue to receive all forms of e-communications*.
Please click the button to confirm your interest in Honeywell Aerospace.
YES, I'M IN <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
Thank you,
Team Honeywell
*E-communications refers to e-mail, social media and digital advertising.
You can unsubscribe from our electronic communications at any time by clicking here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html?mkt_unsubscribe=1&]]>.
